name: Simple RTS
description:
Simple RTS is a Simple Real-Time-Strategy Game Like in the good old days, with 20 types of units

The goal is simply to conquer all territories on the map, which is also your AI opponent's goal...

The main features:
  • Looks like Dune2, Feels like Z & Tower Defense (very dynamic and stressful)
  • Well balanced units
  • Helpful mini-map
  • Resources gathering
  • Accuracy bonus for units on higher ground
  • Units are leveling up for each kill

Some cool examples of special units in the game:
  • Invisible bike to spy enemy territories
  • Tank that can teleport to any location on the map
  • Artillery that bombs any chosen area on the map
  • Rocket launcher that converts the enemy to join your side
  • And more surprises...
